**Is this a new escape technique or a tool feature?**
- [ ] New escape technique / CVE
- [ ] New enumerator check
- [ ] Analysis engine improvement
- [ ] CLI / output enhancement
- [ ] Other

**Describe the feature**
A clear description of what you want added.

**For new techniques, include:**
- Technique name:
- Category (capability / mount / kernel / runtime / combinatorial / info_disclosure):
- Severity (critical / high / medium / low):
- CVE (if applicable):
- Prerequisites (what container configuration is required):
- PoC command:
- MITRE ATT&CK mapping:
- References (blog posts, advisories, write-ups):

**Why is this valuable?**
Explain the use case or attack scenario this covers.
